name: Brain Card Play - Solitaire
description:
Just move cards with a single tap or drag them to the destination. You can make full use of your brain to complete the classic game. If you like card game,Brain Card Play - Solitaire will give you endless fun. And the most important thing is that it is a single player card game and available for Free!
a features:

Single tap or drag and drop to move a card
Solitaire 1 card draw
Solitaire 3 cards draw
Game leaderboards and achievements
Right and left hand deal layouts
Sound that can be turned on/off
Unlimited free solitaire games
